name: LafayetteBitcoin.com
body:
#Welcome to _Lafayette Bitcoin_ 
 
### Our Mission
To bring awareness of the versatility of BITCOIN and its practically for use in the common market place. We wish to educate the community on the cryptocurrency and the advantages and risks of its use. The concept of digital money can be a hard concept to grasp at times. We want to enable the the exchange of ideas, current affairs, as well as local trade of goods, services, and commodities. Moreover, we lead our area to understand the signifigance of the [The Blockchain](https://www.blockchain.com/) technologies.
### What IS Bitcoin?
<iframe width="586" height="329" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/Gc2en3nHxA4" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen></iframe>

### Authors and Contributors
You can @mention a GitHub username to generate a link to their profile. The resulting `<a>` element will link to the contributor’s GitHub Profile. For example: In 2007, Chris Wanstrath (@defunkt), PJ Hyett (@pjhyett), and Tom Preston-Werner (@mojombo) founded GitHub.

### Support or Contact
Having trouble with Pages? Check out our [documentation](https://help.github.com/pages) or [contact support](https://github.com/contact) and we’ll help you sort it out.
